contentList.content: Your Patron Tasks you with a Quest on every <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">short</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>. If you fulfill it, you will be rewarded.
Your Patron has rewarded you with with an enhanced Weapon. You Weapon Attack additionally deal [1].
fourth level Spell Slots, or spell slots are full.
fifth level Spell Slots, or spell slots are full.
Deal at least [1] to an enemy to gain the favor of your Patron.
Use a Evocation Spell to gain the favor of your Patron.
Kill an Enemy with a Spell to gain the favor of your Patron.
Your Patron demands proof of your obedience, reduce your health to half or below.
Roll all your Damage with Advantage.
